name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior QA Engineer with 8 years in ensuring high-quality software solutions, applying strong expertise in **Python**, **JavaScript**, **REST API**, and modern testing frameworks like **PyTest** and **Playwright**. Proficient in leveraging **Azure Pipelines**, **Jira**, **Azure DevOps**, and **Git** for efficient CI/CD processes and collaboration. Extensive knowledge of both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, including **Cosmos DB** and **MongoDB**, enhances my ability to validate data integrity across applications.

Demonstrated success in performance and load testing to ensure system reliability and user satisfaction. An advocate for team collaboration and effective communication, I bring skills in **Identity and Access Management** and **Datadog** for monitoring and optimizing application health. My strong background in software development, bolstered by a full-stack proficiency in **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, allows me to contribute to the overall software lifecycle and integrate quality at every stage.
